hero.headline: Discover your favorite WhatsApp communities... Intelligently.
hero.subheadline: The first platform guaranteeing 100% active links, with AI-powered recommendations.
hero.searchPlaceholder: What are you looking for? (e.g., Jobs, Crypto, Sports)...

claim.modalTitle: Do you own this channel? Your audience is waiting!
claim.modalBody: Verify your channel now to unlock exclusive analytics and growth features for free.
claim.verificationInstructions: Place the following code in your WhatsApp channel description for 5 minutes:
claim.successMessage: Congratulations! You are now the official owner of this channel.
claim.errorMessage: We couldn't find the verification code in your channel description. Please try again.
claim.expiredMessage: Verification code has expired. Please generate a new one.

errors.brokenLink: Sorry, our Auto-Health Check detected this link is inactive. Admin has been notified.

footer.description: Chanly - The Intelligent WhatsApp Channels Discovery Platform

about.title: About Us
about.description: Chanly is a sophisticated platform for discovering WhatsApp channels, built with modern technologies and designed to provide the best experience for users and channel owners.
